# My Python Package

A simple Python package for demonstration purposes.

## Installation

```bash
pip install gangthisisatestbro
```

## Usage

```python
from gangthisisatestbro import example

# Get a greeting
greeting = example.get_greeting("World")
print(greeting)  # Output: Hello, World!
```
